channel.title: Jar Help - Error
channel.description:
I have a 317 Client for a Project Insanity.
The Base Client with no changes, jars perfectly fine, and you can launch it up. But if I even comment out 1 useless line of text in say, the Gui and try jarring I will receive the same error every time when trying to run it.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/URJ1Z.png[/img]
I am not sure how to fix this or what is causing it.
My Manifest Looks like this
[code] Main-Class: client
[/code]
What's more odd, is if I go back and uncomment the line and re-compile. I still get the same error, so problem in short - If I mess with anything in the files, I cannot jar. And If I fix my changes to original, it still will not allow me to jar.
Please help, thanks.
